hedline.hl1: Parents' Night Out In St. Thomas

abstract.p: Bolongo Bay Beach Club and Villas in St Thomas is offering parents Date Night, one free night of baby-sitting for every week's stay (S)

block.p: Family vacations are wonderful, but sometimes Mom and Dad want time alone together. The Bolongo Bay Beach Club and Villas in St. Thomas offers parents a Date Night, one free night of baby-sitting for every week's stay. The program, available through Sept. 30, uses Nannies in Paradise, a company with licensed child-care professionals. Rates are $145 per room, with up to two children in the room, including a Continental breakfast. Also, children 12 or younger eat free in the resort restaurant when their parents dine there. Call (800) 524-4746.
